# v0.10.7

## 🚀 Features
- atom components refactor to functional:
  - SfBreadcrumbs
  - SfBullet
  - SfButton
  - SfColor
  - SfHeading
  - SfIcon
  - SfLink
  - SfQuantitySelector
  - SfRating
  - SfSkeleton
  - SfTextarea
- SfRange new component implemented

## 🐛 Fixes
- SfAccordion - header text should be aligned left when multiline
- SfBanner, SfCategoryCard, SfTile, SfHeader, SfHero: fixed SSR missmatch
